TopicTitle: Thinking of making this Game called HSP

Articles.Content:
H.S.P.= Human Space Program

It's Like Kerbal Just the only Diff. is that your putting your own species into space and your launching from earth not a fake planet. I just need other people that are willing to help me out. So if your a good coder and want to volnter just message or email me i check both every Monday-Friday 3:00pm-4:00pm (I'm very busy on weekends).
If only KSP added support for custom solar system...

If only KSP added support for custom solar system...

Don't worry Aghanim this game has support for a Custom Solar System. and it also will have several versions and on the website that I'm going to make for it (again Notepad++) will give you Credits That you use to buy diff. Versions of the game (just Came up with that this-morning) the diff. versions are:

-Orig. = 0 credits

-Hsp-Bronze = 15 credits

-Hsp-Silver = 30 credits

-Hsp-Gold = 65 credits

-Hsp-Platenim = 130 credits

-Hsp-Double Diamond = 200 credits

-Hsp-PlatenimDoubleDiamond = 250 credits

-Hsp-Platenim-Double-Diamond-Gold = 365 credits <---|Best your Gonna Get|

and the H.S.P.P.D.D.G. also has support for HD. and Double monitor and allows you to have a Probe/Sat. mapping/locating and it will do it even when your not in a that profile it stops when you close the game.
